question:
You recently took a trip with a taxi company. The driver behaved in an unacceptable way and you had a lot of problems. You complained to the company but no-one has replied to your complaint.


Write a letter to the taxi company. In your letter


say why you are writing and how you feel
explain what happened
tell them what you would like them to do.
text: I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with no response to my letter dated 16.01.2022 complaining about the unacceptable behaviour of your staff in my recent ride which I took last week.

The reason behind this letter is due to non-receival of any response from the company. I expect a fair reply from a reputed firm to address the customer complaints within a stipulated time frame as mentioned in your terms and conditions. However, I felt really uncomfortable to travel anymore with your tour taxi.

The incident took place when I asked the driver to drop me a little ahead of my actual destination. Suprinsegly, he demanded an extra fare of Rs. 500 for a little half a kilometre without any justification. This caused to start arguments and resulted in misbehaviour and dropped me in an unknown area with no access to any public transport.

I would like the company to make an immediate note of this driver Mr Kumar with vehicle KL-05 AZ 7366, he should be morally suspended as a misbehaviour punishment. Also, this will make others  comply with the business rules and make the reputation of the company even better.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
